title: Tautomerism and nucleophilic addition influence the performance of aqueous organic redox flow batteries of chelidamic acid and chelidonic acid
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00331D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Surya Prakash, Alagar Ramar, Fu-Ming Wang, Kefyalew Wagari Guji, Citra Deliana Dewi Sundari, Laurien Merinda
The influence of tautomerism and nucleophilic addition on chelidamic acid and chelidonic acid, compounds with similar molecular weights but different hetero atoms, was investigated in aqueous organic redox flow batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
